Reviews.Title: Simple and handy
Reviews.Author: Whitney "Prime Fan"
Reviews.Content: I LOVED the old chamberlain intercoms with four channels and a volume control, but they don't make that one anymore and it's replacement is quite expensive  After searching the internet for weeks I settled on these ones at about half the price of the other new model.  The real beauty of this product is its simplicity.  Push a button and talk. It does not have wires nor does it need to be plugged into a wall so it is truly portable.  I miss the volume control of the older model, the level on this one is a bit low but it does do the trick for simple communication.  I just wish it would work with my one remaining old Chaimberlain which I think was the best ever made.

Reviews.Title: Poor design
Reviews.Author: E. Sharp
Reviews.Content: Bought this for elderly mother. The long delay from the time you push the button untl you can talk is confusing to a non-techy person. The fact that the initial "beep" after pushing the button is only on the talking side doesn't help the listening/recipient to know to listen. If both push the button too cloes in sequence, no one hears anything. "Walkie Talkies" from the 70s were easier to use, which is essentially what these are with a long delay before you can actually talk. No volume adjustment; also difficult for an elderly person. Not worth sending back because by the time the customer pays full price shipping, you might as well find another use...or throw them out. Not weather proof...resistent perhaps. Each takes 4 AA batteries. Might as well be a 9 volt battery. Sad.

Reviews.Title: Poor range & no doorbell included
Reviews.Author: J. Lyne "ATV NUTS"
Reviews.Content: First of all, under the product description it reads:1,000' range Includes 1 doorbell, this intercom has a very short range of about 100 feet with no obstructions & about 50 feet if you have trees and other buildings in the way. IT HAS NO DOORBELL - NONE, just 2 intercoms that do not ring the other intercom, there is a tone on the unit your talking from but it in no way rings the other intercom, voice quality is very poor and intercoms work intermittently - in other words - sometimes it intercoms, sometimes it don't. I have another Chamberlain Product called the Reporter driveway alarm and it works great, even 1,000 feet away and in same 100 foot locations these intercoms will not. GO FIGURE? I'am buying a hard wired intercom doorbell. I'll update this review if [...] gives me any return problems, still waiting to hear from them.

Reviews.Title: works once
Reviews.Author: CharleyChicago
Reviews.Content: I ordered this pair of intercoms and then had to order a base station which was not clear in the description.  I purchased the doorbell/base station combination to get these to work.  The units have to be programmed to work with each other by removing the cover to get to the "learn" button.  After about a week they stop recognizing each other even though the batteries are not dead.  I'm sick of constantly opening them up and reprogramming them!  Avoid this product.

Reviews.Title: not worth your $$$$
Reviews.Author: sandra
Reviews.Content: these didn't work, you could barely hear 20ft away, much less indoor/outdoor. I sent them back after testing them every which way I could to no avail. DON't waste your money

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: BK "BK"
Reviews.Content: I bought these to use inside the house when my wife had surgery and needed a way to call me.  Now we use them to communicate with the basement/upstairs.  I might eventually put one of them outside.  They work fine, as long as you remember to hold the button down for a bit before you talk.  Otherwise the message gets 'clipped'.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Intercom
Reviews.Author: Jerry Peterson
Reviews.Content: They work good. Setting the volume up helps a lot. Only thing I don't like is having to push the button and wait for the tone until you can speak. Overall not a bad product and serves the purpose....wireless and very portable.

Reviews.Title: Three years with this product before replacement
Reviews.Author: BJ White
Reviews.Content: The bell-alert of this Intercom system works as a very good waterproof doorbell. I don't use the intercom part. Still, it is loud and the receiver is portable. One of the best features is that it can be heard by the person pressing the intercom button as well as pretty much all around the neighborhood ;-). It is mounted on a post exposed to the weather. As it has aged, the batteries seem to be lasting for shorter periods of time so am replacing the unit.

Reviews.Title: Holds up greeat in the elements
Reviews.Author: Christopher Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I have one on my shed near my pool and the other int he house.  We can easily communicate and it works well.  The only downside is that you have to wait a second for the tone, which indicates your ready to speak.  If you talk too soon, the listener will not hear everything you have to say.

Reviews.Title: ok for low noise
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: does not work so well on a busy street and the door is eight feet from the road in cleveland

Reviews.Title: Good Product!!!
Reviews.Author: ryan Beaudoin
Reviews.Content: Not sure why everyone is bashing this product....Product matches description, easy to set up and easy to use. We use these at our office building and couldn't be happier! Much cheaper than running wires.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What It Promised
Reviews.Author: Edward Laska
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and setup.  Solved my problem of being in a detached garage.  The range was what they advertised.

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Dudley Ward
Reviews.Content: I put them on a back door for my mom and dad, The house is brick , just put one on outside wall and one on inside wall. You do have to mash the button a little hard to get the tone so you can talk and program them but that is not hard. I would buy them again

Reviews.Title: Chamberlain Should be Forced Out of Business
Reviews.Author: long-time-Remington-user
Reviews.Content: We purchased this system after much research.  The research was not all positive, but we doubted the product could be as bad as some said.  We were wrong!  The product was far worse.Specifics:The volume is so low that if there is any noise in the background you can not hear the other party.The "learn" function is so quircky that you aren't sure when it is complete.The life of the system is very short. Ours lasted less that a year.The "manual" hardly qualifies as such.  The clarity of the procedural steps is awful.  An one key step is missing completely.Overall I'd say they should pay us to use their badly defective product.

Reviews.Title: Performed As Advertised
Reviews.Author: Gordon L. Macwilliam
Reviews.Content: I mounted the outside unit above the doorbell and for portability routed a string through the inside unit bolt holes to hang it on a cup hook on the inside of the closet door.  The sound quality from the kitchen was static free.

Reviews.Title: NOT compatible with Wireless Portable Intercom Voice Activated
Reviews.Author: LisaDawn McCabe "FuzzyRev"
Reviews.Content: I bought these units together with the Wireless Portable Intercom Voice Activated, both made by Chamberlain and from the same internet page because they were supposed to work together. THEY DON'T! They do, however, set up their own network just fine and work separately of the Chamberlain Wireless Portable Intercom (VOX) system. Unfortunately that isn't what I needed. I have a seriously ill housemate who needs to be able to simply call out to get help quickly. When two of four units don't work together, this cannot happen.In addition, one of the two units in the box didn't receive at all. It seemed to set up just fine but when we tried to test it, we were not able to receive anything. It squawked initially but then quit doing even that.I'm returning the portable units and getting another base station along with an additional power supply to avoid having to use batteries.

Reviews.Title: Great for multi-level home!
Reviews.Author: Liz Pensa
Reviews.Content: My son's have a finished play room in the attic on the 3rd floor, so it is stressful running up or yelling up to get their attention. So I keep one intercom in our kitchen and the other on the third floor and it makes for very smooth communication. Great Product and I would reccommend to others with children in the same situation I was in :)

Reviews.Title: not what I needed
Reviews.Author: Gerald J.
Reviews.Content: These work and can be added to the other indoor intercoms. I needed to constantly hear the outside and this was not able to stay in constant speaking mode. Chamberlin told me if I did manage to keep the talk button pressed at all times the unit would be damaged.  I sent them back and have made my other Chamberlin intercoms work in monitor mode.  Chamberlin customer service is excellent!  They want to solve any problem you have if possible.

Reviews.Title: Zero support! 20+ minute hold times are normal
Reviews.Author: John S "John S"
Reviews.Content: After being on forever hold and listening to ads about their garage door openers, I can't help but wonder why a garage door company bothers to sell intercoms. Tech support is completely useless; they know nothing about intercoms! If you want to program 2 units to talk to each other, no problem, but if you need to program multiple units to speak on private channels, you are s.c.r.e.w.e.d!I finally got hold of a "tech" (non English script-reader) and after reading the same useless manual they included with their products,they suggested "just send the products back."  Garbage products and garbage support! A perfect combination!

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Duane S.
Reviews.Content: It would be nice if there was a handsfree option like there is on the indoor units - it but that's just not the way it was designed. Not many people know they have to push to talk when they answer a call from the other unit. Batteries last about a year.  I'd probably buy it again anyway.

Reviews.Title: it's Okay
Reviews.Author: David Terwilliger
Reviews.Content: Sound Quality is poor in my estimation.  sounds like you're talking from within a tin can.  Actually it is very much like the sound quality of two tin cans connected with a string.  really no joke it's just like that.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Indoor/outdoor Portable Intercom-weatherproof
Reviews.Author: C A Oliver
Reviews.Content: The units arrived in perfect condition. These are just what we were looking for. They work just fine for our purpose.

Reviews.Title: Product not working.  Falling apart.
Reviews.Author: vijay nathan
Reviews.Content: The product was dead on arrival,  Did not work.  It was falling apart.  Tried with new set of batteries. Will return the product.

Reviews.Title: dont buy
Reviews.Author: nicholas mendez
Reviews.Content: product worked for less than a week  and we kept it indoor ,product is very cheaply made trust me dont  buy this product

Reviews.Title: The directions are written backwards but the units work OK
Reviews.Author: M. Ketron "NorthCoast"
Reviews.Content: Needed them for a play school where the rug-rats can play "control tower talks to airplane."  After painting each push-to-talk button bright orange, the units are very simple for a 3 year old to use.  The programming directions, like stated in other comments, are terrible.  Hint: read the Clear Memory section first, then Program section.  That is, the procedures are almost written backwards.  Chamberlain did email me directions at my request, but by that time I had already figured out the programming myself.  Not hard, only a bit confusing.  The units have only been mounted in the control tower and the airplane for a couple of weeks, so I don't know how long the batteries will last or how long the units can withstand true abuse. I figure even two weeks of continuous button-pushing from play-schoolers equals about a year of normal use so they have passed the test...

Reviews.Title: inoperative and no data sheet
Reviews.Author: Robert R. Stevens, Jr.
Reviews.Content: Items arrived in a double walled paper envelope with what looked like shredded asbestos between the walls. No damage there but installation of 4 new bateries In each did nothing. Batteries checked ok in circuit and dropped voltage slightly when the talk button was activated. I have no idea what the issue is. What now?

Reviews.Title: work on and off.  stopped using them and just went back to texting
Reviews.Author: Chris B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this set to use in my separated garage/house when I'm working on a car.  It took me a bit of time to understand instructions and find the "set" button.  Once I got them synced it was a few days of non-use and they no longer worked, so I synchronized the pair again and did not attempt to try to use them for a few more days and then they were obnoxiously loud.  I tried to call the company but waited on the phone for 15 minutes before asking if I'd like a call back, I pushed the button for yes and we hung up.  a week later someone called and I had already moved on to a different technology.  HOLLA!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Intercom gets the job done...wish it were a bit better
Reviews.Author: Richard L. Hess
Reviews.Content: This intercom gets the job done, but I wish it were a bit better. Battery life is not that great (about four months with Imedion NiMH cells). Its RF communication is OK but not outstanding. My DECT 6.0 cordless phones seem better.Loses memory during battery change so the whole system needs reprogramming after the batteries are changed.

Reviews.Title: Lacks full disclosure
Reviews.Author: PL Customer
Reviews.Content: In order to operate this product you will need an additional piece of equipment that can cost up to several hundred dollars.

Reviews.Title: Poor support
Reviews.Author: Robert B.
Reviews.Content: Could not establish network or. Connection  between intercoms. Manufacturer provided no tech assistance at website. 2 3 4 5 6

Reviews.Title: Excellent Wireless Intercom
Reviews.Author: John Bergquist
Reviews.Content: This was the best wireless product of all I researched. Previously had units from another store and they never worked properly

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: precious510
Reviews.Content: We installed it at my daughters back door for when friends and others stop.  They can inform her they are there, then she lets them know she is on her way.  (She has to use a wheelchair, so it takes some time for her to get to the door.)  Works great!

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Arch Luther
Reviews.Content: I bought these to replace a pair of them that had been in service for 4 or 5 years. As I remember from then, the programming instructions were difficult to understand. They still are. I still don't have them working. I'm a computer guy, so I guess I'll eventually figure it out, as I did 4 or 5 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Walkie talkie action with lousy reception--what a door communicator! NOT!
Reviews.Author: YourNorthernSouthern
Reviews.Content: Hurt my hip and needed a portable talkie to answer my door without going to the wall mount.  Remember the old fashioned walkie talkies that were so frustrating?  That's pretty much what this is.  The instructions were pretty bad too.  Missing a key part and had to work with the company to get it working.  NO ONE at my front door has successfully communixated with me.  I kept it only because I can at least talk with visitor to give them instructions.  It won't work with my existing WIRED intercom (has only one mounted panel on the wall in kitchen, but no action required from visitor and clear clear CLEAR0.  Also, had to mount to glass on the storm door because my house is solid brick and didn't want the temporary fix to ruin the fascade.  Sorry, this is just not worth more than a few bucks like a kids' toy.  I'll be glad when my hips heal. :(

Reviews.Title: Unable to use.
Reviews.Author: Virginia Dunham
Reviews.Content: Unabke to use or understand assembly instructions. Need help. Sits in box now on couch. Very frustrating. Must be something missing.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS A PILE OF JUNK
Reviews.Author: Arnold Billings
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE BIGGEST RIP OFF I HAVE EVER SEEN....THE MANUFACTURER SHOUD BE PUT OUT OF BUSINESS....I AM 72 YEARS OLD WITH HEART CONDITION AND NEEDED AN INTERCOM TO CALL FOR HELP JUST 35 FEET AWAY AT THE OTHER END OF THE HOUSE....I HOPE EVERYONE WHO SEES THIS PROUCT WILL READ THIS AND NEVER PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY...Wireless Indoor/outdoor Protable Intercom-weatherproofSHAME ON YOU AMAZON FOR SELLING THIS JUNK

Reviews.Title: Product doesn't work as advertised; unreliable.
Reviews.Author: P+A
Reviews.Content: We needed to have a simple intercom system in our small office building, with one intercom remaining on the outside of the building and the other kept at the front desk. The distance between the outdoor space and the front desk of the office is about 25-30 feet. The advertisement for this product boasts "1000 foot range", which is sorely miscalculated. The intercoms are both unreliable and only work when within a very specific distance of one another; neither intercom worked when 5 feet away, nor 25 feet away, but at 10-15 feet distance (and both inside the building) they appeared to function OK.I would highly recommend NOT buying this product. It's clearly poor quality and doesn't function as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Trip Gore "2B"
Reviews.Content: I use this product to communicate between my dock and summer house at the lake.  The sound is crystal clear and I have the two units 200' apart.

Reviews.Title: First clue it isn't a good buy
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: If the company can't spell "portable" correctly,that in itself may be an indication. I have not purchased this item but based on the reviews and the product write up from the company , I shall look at other products. Thank you all!

Reviews.Title: intercom Wireless
Reviews.Author: Max L. Hatfield "Max L. Hatfield"
Reviews.Content: I have  not had the oportunity to use this product yet. I did like the color and shape and size.Sorry I cannot make a statement yet as to it's performance and wether it will broadcast the distance as prommised.
